Name: Peanut (PH)
Description: Within the textured shell there is a nut so delicious it's widely cultivated and imported everywhere.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Within the textured shell there is a nut so delicious it's widely cultivated and imported everywhere.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: Within the textured shell there is a nut so delicious it's widely cultivated and imported everywhere.
DescriptionLocalization.de: In der texturierten Schale ist eine Nuss, die so köstlich ist, dass sie weltweit angebaut und importiert wird.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Within the textured shell there is a nut so delicious it's widely cultivated and imported everywhere.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Within the textured shell there is a nut so delicious it's widely cultivated and imported everywhere.
DescriptionLocalization.it: Within the textured shell there is a nut so delicious it's widely cultivated and imported everywhere.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: Within the textured shell there is a nut so delicious it's widely cultivated and imported everywhere.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Within the textured shell there is a nut so delicious it's widely cultivated and imported everywhere.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Внутри скорлупы находится орех, настолько вкусный, что его выращивают и продают повсеместно.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Within the textured shell there is a nut so delicious it's widely cultivated and imported everywhere.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 在网状纹理的外壳里有一种非常美味的坚果，它被广泛种植和进口到各地。
